p: The characteristics of the studied population are summarized in Table 1. The sample did not present a statistically significant difference between the participants of the three groups, regarding sex ( P=0.962), race ( P=0.967), family history of glaucoma ( P=0.608), comorbidities ( P=0.058) and form of virus acquisition ( P=0.801). However, in relation to the age variable, a low P-value ( P=0.03) was observed, with the patients in group 3 being the youngest.
